title: Rebels of the Kasbah
description: Prepare for a World of Adventure Go back in time to 1912 Morocco. An age of mystery. A time of danger. A group of children confront the mysteries of an ancient kasbah. A pirate who is not what he seems. A British colonel forced to choose between his country and his conscience. A deadly assassin who must make a series of drastic decisions. A Chinese martial artist as fierce as she is beautiful. A war lord who will stop at nothing to protect his empire. Welcome to the Red Hand Adventures.
author: Joe  O'Neill
